duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide pre-award fiscal management and administrative support to the Division Administrator within the Division of Citywide Case Management and the Division of Substance Abuse and Addiction Medicine.
Collaborate with the Division Administrator to oversee contract/grant budgets, generate accurate financial reports, and ensure compliance with project guidelines.
Manage pre-award financial administration for research funds, offer expert guidance on complex research administration matters, and review and approve financial transactions.
Coordinate and implement budget allocations, reconcile ledger accounts, and support financial audits and procurement systems.
Engage in special assignments and other duties as requested.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor Degree in business administration, accounting, finance, or related field (Master’s degree preferred)
